title: Nocturne's ult should mini-fear all enemy champions immediately around his target.
body:
Because he jump scares them.

All the lights go out, a horrible voice whispers _"Darkness..."_ and then a monster from your worst nightmares comes barreling out of the shadows.

You would shit your pants and run away. I dont care how much Demacia you have, no one can have that happen without wanting to find cover.

It would be thematic, awesome, and a nice little buff for a jungler who badly needs something going for him. 

Rito pls.

replies.body: {{champion:5}} ''The warrior's spirit is never broken.''

Ive suggested this like two years ago. 

Also- I highly suggested that if he doesnt use the dash on the ult, only the darkness for utility, the CD is halved.

And for the giggles, if he fears a target, he should get bonus lifesteal OR the more enemy champs his passive hits, the more lifesteal he gets (like 4 per champion, so 5 champs = 20% lifesteal)

> Also- I highly suggested that if he doesnt use the dash on the ult, only the darkness for utility, the CD is halved.

I did the math, with %45 CDR and not using the dash at rank 3, his ult would be at a 27.5 second cooldown. On one for all, if you timed it right, you could synchronize all of the ults to use one every 5.5 seconds. If the near sight lasts for 4 seconds, that means that they can never see shit

Holy fuck, that would be an amazing to see

> Holy fuck, that would be an amazing to see

but you wouldn't be seeing anything

I didn't see what you did there

Or anything for that matter

Sort of counterproductive with his passive, isn't it?  AoE damage that he can't use when everyone is feared out of range.

And he doesn't need a buff, he's already in a good spot.
Let's give him a charm
itd be like a horror movie! complete darkness, obvious monster... "let's go investigate!!"

Nocturne has a very old kit that needs some work on. 
I've mained with Noc into Diamond 4 Season 5. 

His passive is garbage.
His early clear is pathetic.
His laning phase is...actually pretty good.
The fact that Rengar can see everyone in his ult, and Noc The Lord of Darkness cannot, makes no sense.
His Fear is Fantastic.
His W as well.

What Noc really needs is a better passive and an escape.
I'll agree with the notion for a better passive, but I feel there is no need for an escape.

well here's the thing, a balanced/healthy assassin is supposed to have someway of getting out of a fight without dying, otherwise you get champs like rengar and talon. By allowing that, they are able to adjust power better through their kits.

Nocturne is NOT suppose to be a straight up assassin.

Sure you could build him as such, but hes more of built to be a duelist/tank shredder/finisher.

What, finisher?

A good noc, always uses his ult to chase someone who has flash.
he was designed as and is considered by riot to be an assassin. He is just an assassin who's kit forces him to build bruiser.

Malz was designed to be a mid, but he still jungles.

Tryn was made to be a brute, but was better built as a wizard in season 2.

? malz was designed to be a mage, of which he is, your point does not make sense. And the only reason i said that noct was designed to be an assassin is because in riot's future attempts this champion, they will more than likely change him with the idea of an assassin in mind.
Talon has invisibility to disengage and Rengar has a passive MS boost that lets him outrun most enemies when he comes out of his ult. Not to mention a passive that turns him into a grasshopper.
talons ult is usually used for burst though, and that mvpsd doesnt allow rengar to get out consistently, and his passive is pretty much engage only.

The passive isn't even that bad. Like 120% damage AoE auto can actually be really strong when enemies are clumped. Yeah the heal is kinda garbage, but I really don't think that the passive is the problem.

At a high level, the biggest thing wrong with noc is that his early clear is garb and his mana costs are miserable. At all levels below master, he's actually really good IMO.
tell that to a certain vi/nocturne streamer

> tell that to a certain vi/nocturne streamer

Not really sure what point you're trying to make. Is it that super metroid is sucessful with it in master? Or that he thinks nocturne is bad?

I agree but he doesn't need a escape. He has a really nice engage that basically guarantees you a kill. But that depends on how you use it. If you use it in a team fight, then you have your team to back you up but if you go in alone, you get punished and die.

{{champion:56}} DAAAAAARKNESSS-
{{champion:86}} DEMACIAAAAA!
{{champion:56}} *Gets feared*

This would fit thematicly, but wouldnt be a good idea.

I mean, he is already unstoppable during his ult... and a fed nocturne could simply jump on a target he chosses and rip it apart while the enemy team cant position around him to protect him. It wouldn't fit in his kit simply and would be a wrong way to buff an assassin.

The job of an assassin is to pick out targets at the right moment and kill them fast, but this way noc could just jump in when he wants no matter if the complete enemy team is around the enemy carry

It's a mini fear, and it fits on a diver assassin. It gives him a short window to start his attack on someone without really over doing it, think something like .5 second fear that gets the enemy team a short step away.

this short step is enough for a fed assasin to kill an enemy.

He should pick out wrong positioned targets at the right moment with his ult.

A fed nocturne would just go and get the kill anyway no matter how the enemys position
But again, nocturne isn't a pure assassin. If he was he wouldnt have a fear, he is a diver. He NEEDS something to allow him to dive into a fight.

But still, he is actually able to kill targets very fast.

You can't just buff a champion randomly because it fits his thematic.

When he needs a buff, some other things would be a better idea.

He already has a spellshield and a fear in his kit, no need for another one.

His thematic should be that he makes everything dark and kills a carry without his team noticing, not simply brainlessy jumping in the enemy team when he decides to

He brings darkness making opponents paranoid, and then when he finds a good opportunity her attacks his target, nearby onlookers are terrified at the beast come to destroy them. But in all honesty, he does need a buff, this would be both fitting and a solid starting point. Honestly, just reworking his spellshield into something different would be a start.
he needs no buff, he isn't weak and his spellshield his great for dives when you time it right

I'd say all enemies period, including minions. 

Great idea though

Um, I don't think he needs a buff, and if he does, then definitely not in the form of his ult. His ult is the most useful (and arguably broken) part of his kit as it stands. Nocturne has a happy little balanced 50.6% win rate, and basically all his ult does at the moment is destroy anyone playing solo. His dash is borderline ridiculous to start. If Nocturne needs a buff, then I'd suggest making his Q not show up through the fog of war. Realistic or not, this buff will not balance him.
His Q shows up on the minimap?! That's absolutely asinine.
Whatever, I made a mistake, so what. No reason to be such a nazi when everyone knows what I mean.

Oh, my apologies. I didn't mean you were insane for saying that, I said it's stupid for it to show up on the minimap. That's what I meant was asinine, not you for saying that. I believed you xD Sorry for the misunderstanding!

It does show up through the "Fog of War" his ultimate causes if you would have sight from an ally in the area it's cast.

I don't believe you can see it in the regular Fog of War like when he early clears jungle, unless it comes through a wall in to an area you can see.
Ah, yeah, thanks for clearing it up!
So you want him to have a double fear mechanic?

As a guy who likes to play Nocturne, i feel this would just allow him to dive anyone he wants and with no repercussions or counter-play, he will pretty much become a semi-Global Rengar and you know how people love themselves some Rengar jumpscares {{champion:107}} Look at that face it's the face of i'm coming for that booty and you can't stop me

> All the lights go out, a horrible voice whispers "Darkness..." and then a monster from your worst nightmares comes barreling out of the shadows.

Nocturne really doesn't look that scary- I mean look at the guy- he's just a dark dude with no legs and razors or his arms.
Strange? Sure
Unusual? Sure
Deadly? I'd back away
But if he's supposed to be some monster than scares people just by looking at him- he falls woefully short of the goal.
You must have never played vs a fed nocturne
By that logic Jinx is the scariest motherfucker on the Rift.
How about we not touch Nocturne at all hes in a really solid spot right now and if Riot nerfs/buffs him its gonna ruin him.

it already mini fears everyone, when you hear his ult, you freak out if you arent ahead or if you are in a horrible position, the stress ruins players mindsets as is
that would be broken lol

If the ultimate will fear all the enemy champion it will be like a leona ult, just no .
There are so much champions in league of legends that are so strong to have no fear of the enemy: Darius, Garen and even more Illaoi ( she fought against the Shadow Island a lot of time and she has no fear, also Nagakabouros ) .
